helpgrid.innerhtml: <LI> To assign the selected dispatch request to a driver and vehicle, click OK. <LI> To assign the dispatch request to a different driver, edit the driver code field for the requirement. <LI> To reschedule the dispatch request edit the Scheduled Date field for the requirement.
<LI> To start a dispatch request, click OK. <LI> To modify the start time, edit the Actual Start Date field.
<LI> To complete a dispatch request, click OK. <LI> When the dispatch request is finished, Maximo either completes or closes the dispatch request.

radiobutton.label: Display Drivers That Can at Least Partially Satisfy the Unmet Requirements
Only Display Drivers That can Fully Satisfy the Unmet Requirements
